document.full_text: the army is reprimanding nine officers for leadership failures in connection with the shooting rampage at fort hood, texas, and their failure to detect problems with the accused shooter.
document.title: washington: 9 fort hood officers reprimanded
lines_and_colors: the army is reprimanding nine officers for leadership failures in connection with the shooting rampage at fort hood, texas, and their failure to detect problems with the accused shooter.
